name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buscador: Search for a web page portion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you select a portion of the web page and search for it on the Internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can easily highlight and select any part of a web page that piques your interest. Want to know more about what you've highlighted? Simply hit the search button, and it will fetch you the links to the web pages with the relevant information.

How to use it:
1. Simply click on the extension icon in the toolbar.
2. The webpage will slightly dim, allowing you to draw a rectangle to mark the specific portion you're interested in searching for. Get creative with your rectangle!
3. Now, just click on the "Search" button.
4. If there's relevant information related to the portion you've selected, it'll be displayed for you. To learn more about your target, just visit the interesting link by clicking on the provided card.
